meanings.definition: A test used to record the electrical activity produced by skeletal muscles.
meanings.sent1: During the electromyograms, electrodes are placed on the skin to measure muscle activity.
meanings.sent2: The doctor reviewed the electromyograms to understand the muscle function.
meanings.sent3: The electromyograms showed the muscles were dancing to their own electric beat!
meanings.sent4: Her muscles whispered secrets through the electromyograms.
meanings.sent5: The electromyograms painted a colorful picture of muscle movements.

meanings.definition: The results of a test that records the electrical activity produced by skeletal muscles.
meanings.sent1: After the test, the electromyograms displayed the muscle activity patterns.
meanings.sent2: She was relieved when the electromyograms showed normal muscle function.
meanings.sent3: The electromyograms threw a party with the muscle activity results!
meanings.sent4: The electromyograms revealed a hidden world of muscle electricity.
meanings.sent5: The electromyograms captured the essence of muscle performance.
